ygData.subject: Re: Re: Mino horn has gained no additional properties
ygData.msgSnippet: Be still thy tongue, John(tm) !! There are SOME bardettes who would give up Rodcets nice fishy to be able to dance! Of course, I sorta like the idea of the men
ygData.messageBody:
Be still thy tongue, John(tm) !!

There are SOME bardettes who would give up Rodcets nice fishy
to be able to dance!

Of course, I sorta like the idea of the men being forced to dance
for us =)

Frashii, 26th 'White Mans Shuffle' Bard
Seekers of Lore officer, Tarew Marr http://www.loreseekers.com


> On Thu, 28 Oct 1999, Donny Dane wrote:
> >
> > as far as I can tell, the Mino Horns did not gain anything additional,
even
> > though the patch message said they did.
>
> Arrrggghhh! No! The humanity!
>
> The mino horn no longer STOPS you from doing the silly dance!
> You dance with it just as if you were using a flute.
> Noooooooooo!!!!
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
